function.name: cooking_cancel
function.description: This function is used to cancel the current cooking process on a cooker.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device whose cooking process is being canceled.

predefinedCompartment.description: The specific compartment of the device whose cooking process is being canceled.

groupAction.description: The group action related to the devices.
